name: Death and Tax Evasion
description:
"Heaven and hell never expected companies to get souls, but they did and now they are trying to work out what to do with you..."

This is a prototype build of my planned game about tax evasion in the afterlife.

It contains the core game system which, in the final game, will have additional mechanics, deck building progression and a story about what happens when a company dies.

Any feedback you have would be amazing, my super short feedback form can be found here: https://forms.gle/KLfSUjzuqNcvHxoT6
